I'm researching an historical event(or events?) about farmers 
rebelling against their Samurai masters using their farm tools as 
weapons. Am I correct that it was the Shimabara rebellion? If not, 
please help me find the right event.

I need specific names and dates and locations. Any info or links or 
book recommendations would be great.

Thank you,
Doug C.
